sitecontact_definition.customtext: If you prefer, please use the form below to contact us and we will respond to you as soon as possible. Thank you.
sitecontact_definition.webconfirmtext: Thank you for contacting us. Your message has been successfully sent.
sitecontact_definition.notetouser:

Thank you for your interest.
